price: 33 et produit devant eux des miracles qui furent autant de grâces manifestes à leur intention.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
